ingredients: 16 oz jar of 505 Southwestern Red Enchilada Sauce (or any red enchilada sauce of your  choice, make sure it's gluten free if that's what you prefer)
1 can of black beans (15 oz) - rinsed and drained
1 can of corn (15 oz) - rinsed and drained
2 large chicken breasts - cooked and shredded
2 cups Mexican blend shredded cheese (or whichever shredded cheese you'd like)
